name: Parallel (itch) (Lachlan)
description:
Parallel is a short journey where you are plunged into unstable universes which are merging into one. Developed for the Geta Game Jam 12 with the themes 'unstable' and 'two colours'.

Notes: The executable and runnable jar files have both been uploaded for ease.  Furthermore, there are unfortunately some known bugs (primarily concerning the menu and portals), however, due to time restrictions, they have not yet been resolved. A future update may come out resolving these issues.
